author: jimmygchen
content:
Hi <@808969530608451584> ðŸ‘‹ 
Is there a limit on how many blobs goomy blob can send in a slot? I tried running it with the following args in kurtosis but it doesn't seem to be sending more than 6 blobs in a slot :

```
# Configuration place for goomy the blob spammer - https://github.com/ethpandaops/goomy-blob
goomy_blob_params:
  # Up to 3 blobs per tx, and 12 tx per slot
  goomy_blob_args: ["combined", "-b 3", "-t 12", "--max-pending 3"]
```

I'm wondering if it's because we're hitting max-pending or if the spammer isn't sending the txs, I see `BlobsPerBlock` constant defined here but not used anywhere. It could well be an issue in CL/EL though, but thought it may be  worth checking if I'm using it correctly.
https://github.com/ethpandaops/goomy-blob/blob/master/utils/constant.go#L3

author: pk910
content:
That constant is not used, it's just a leftover ðŸ™‚
there shouldn't be anything that prevents you from sending more blobs.  But I'd increase the max-pending count a bit,  because it won't send more than 3 transactions even with a throughput of 12  then
